location: Arcoris SoHo - Mont' Kiara, Greater KL

showroom.address: UEM Sunrise Showcase 21, Jalan Kiara, Mont’Kiara, 50480 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
showroom.operating_hours: Weekdays: 9.30am to 5.30pm Weekends and Public Holidays: 10.00am to 5.00pm

description: Arcoris SoHo offers Studio, 1- and 2-bedroom units, spread across 25 uniquely designed floors, taking into consideration the occupants’ individuality. Private gardens are attached to select units. Outside the private units are spaces designed to be conducive for work, networking or pure relaxation.
